summary: Researched historical context for BMCS adoption and validity notion assessment. Found: (1) Original Truth Lemma backwards direction for box was architecturally unprovable due to quantification over all histories vs. only canonical histories. (2) Current system has two complementary completeness results (BMCS and FMP-internal) that together with standard soundness form a complete metalogic. Both are 'right' completeness in the Henkin sense.

artifacts.summary: Historical analysis of Truth Lemma backwards direction problem and validity notion assessment showing BMCS provides Henkin-style completeness
